content: marcellodesales: Made significant documentation improvements through 3 merged PRs (#1722, #1992, #1798) totaling over +41K/-25K lines, with PR #1798 fixing broken CI docs being the largest contribution (+22K/-21K lines). Created and closed 2 issues (#1720, #1711) related to Docker containerization and Kubernetes deployment. Contributed actively but sporadically (3 days this month), with a balanced focus between feature work, bug fixes, and documentation improvements, primarily modifying docs and configuration files.
